Description: ManageBac is the leading IB learning management system (LMS) - the trusted choice of over 3,000 IB World schools supporting the IB DP, CP, MYP and PYP.
Name: ManageBac

Methods.Name: List Updated Memberships
Methods.Description: List all memberships updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Memberships
Methods.Description: List all memberships.

Methods.Name: List Updated Students
Methods.Description: List all students updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: Create Student
Methods.Description: Creates new student record.

Methods.Name: Get Student
Methods.Description: Retrieves a single student.

Methods.Name: List Students
Methods.Description: List all students.

Methods.Name: Update Student
Methods.Description: Updates a student record.

Methods.Name: Archive Student
Methods.Description: Archives the student record hiding the student from classes, groups etc.

Methods.Name: Unarchive Student
Methods.Description: Reverses the archive operation on the student record, showing the student in classes, groups etc.

Methods.Name: List Parents
Methods.Description: List all parents.

Methods.Name: Archive Parent
Methods.Description: Archives the parent record. This action will hide the parent from groups they are members of.

Methods.Name: Unarchive Parent
Methods.Description: Reverses the archive operation on the parent record. This action will restore the parent's group membership and show the parent in groups they were members of before archive action.

Methods.Name: Get Parent
Methods.Description: Retrieves a single parent.

Methods.Name: Create Parent
Methods.Description: Create a new parent.

Methods.Name: Update Parent
Methods.Description: Update a parent.

Methods.Name: List Updated Teachers
Methods.Description: List all updated teachers since the last run.

Methods.Name: Create Teacher
Methods.Description: Create a new teacher.

Methods.Name: List Teachers
Methods.Description: List all teachers.

Methods.Name: Get Teacher
Methods.Description: Retrieves a teacher.

Methods.Name: Update Teacher
Methods.Description: Update a teacher.

Methods.Name: List Year Groups
Methods.Description: List all year groups.

Methods.Name: List Updated Year Groups
Methods.Description: List all year groups updated since last run.

Methods.Name: Remove Students From Year Group
Methods.Description: Remove a list of student IDs from a Year Group.

Methods.Name: Add Students To Year Group
Methods.Description: Adds a list of student IDs to a Year Group.

Methods.Name: List Advisors
Methods.Description: Retrieves the Homeroom, CAS, EE and TOK advisors for a Year Group.

Methods.Name: List Year Group Students
Methods.Description: Retrieves all students that belong to a Year Group.

Methods.Name: List Homeroom Attendance During Term
Methods.Description: Retrieves homeroom attendance for students belonging to a Year Group. The homeroom attendance is retrieved for a Academic Term.

Methods.Name: List Homeroom Attendance For A Date
Methods.Description: Retrieves homeroom attendance for students belonging to a Year Group on a date.

Methods.Name: Get School Subjects
Methods.Description: Retrieves the subject details for enabled subjects. Subjects are only retrieved if the program is enabled at the school. The returned subjects are grouped by program (programmes).

Methods.Name: Get School
Methods.Description: Retrieves school details and enabled programs (programmes).

Methods.Name: Get School Grades
Methods.Description: Retrieves the grade details defined for each programs (programmes) a school runs. It returns grades grouped by each program (programme).

Methods.Name: Get Academic Years
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of academic years and terms defined for each program (programme) enabled for the school.

Methods.Name: Get Class Task
Methods.Description: Retrieves a task that belongs to the class.

Methods.Name: List Class Term Grades
Methods.Description: Retrieves all term grades for a term belonging to a class.

Methods.Name: Get Class
Methods.Description: Retrieves a single class.

Methods.Name: List Student Assesment Results
Methods.Description: Retrieves assessment results of all students for a class task.

Methods.Name: List Updated Classes
Methods.Description: List all classes updated since last run.

Methods.Name: List Class Students
Methods.Description: Retrieves all students belonging to the class.

Methods.Name: List Class Attendance During Term
Methods.Description: Retrieves attendance for all students within a class during an academic term.

Methods.Name: List Class Grades During Term
Methods.Description: Retrieves all gradebook grades for a term belonging to a class.

Methods.Name: List Class Attendance For A Date
Methods.Description: Retrieves the class attendance for all the class students on a given date. The specified date must be between the class's start and end dates.

Methods.Name: List Classes
Methods.Description: List all classes.

Methods.Name: List Class Tasks
Methods.Description: Retrieves all tasks belonging to the class.

Methods.Name: Remove Students From A Class
Methods.Description: Removes students, specified by list of student IDs, from a class.

Methods.Name: Add Students To Class
Methods.Description: Adds students, specified by a list of student IDs, to a class.
